definition: Nantou city and county in central Taiwan
south
surname Nan
to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
Nantou city in central Taiwan, capital of Nantou county
Nantou county in central Taiwan

sentences.english: The research targets were two classes of the forth-grade pupils in Kang-Shou Elementary School, Nantou County.
sentences.chinese: 研究對象爲南投縣康壽國小兩班四年級學生。

sentences.english: The Taipei Bears will be squaring off against the Nantou Magpies.
sentences.chinese: 臺北熊隊將和南投喜鵲隊較勁。

sentences.english: A family in Nantou County discovered a boa coiled up hiding in a bucket that was placed upside down on their balcony.
sentences.chinese: 南投縣一戶人家在家中陽臺發現一條粗大的巨蟒。

sentences.english: Yes, first we'll go to Yilan, then to Hualien and finally to Nantou.
sentences.chinese: 決定好了，先去宜蘭，然後去花蓮，最後到南投。
